document_data.name: The Glowing Goblet
document_data.mainbody:
'''The Glowing Goblet''' was a tavern in the city of [[Elturel]] in the [[Western Heartlands]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]]. It stood on Baerth Lane.

''Circa'' [[1367 DR]], the tavernmaster of the Glowing Goblet was [[Maerpir Tchar]].
